website_summaries.verdict: The only difference between this model and the "Elite" Britax system is slightly less side padding in the infant seat.
pros: Also comes in green or red accents
Takes up less space in the car than other infant seat models, leaving more space for other car seats
Car seat material is easy to clean
cons: Stroller does not come with cup holders

customer_reviews.title: This has a super smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: This has a super smooth ride, put together in less than 10 minutes, bought "used", arrived with tags and Styrofoam around everything, indicating its never been used. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but it’s all set up and meets my expectations. Husband had it all together within minutes. The car seat headrest isn’t as soft as I’d like, but I have a thin small insert to place in it that’s fuzzy that will help. My 4 1/2 yr old toddler (43 lbs) sat and laid in the stroller and I pushed her around the house with no problems. Excited to use it and hook up the car seat in the car at the end of the month. If I don’t update my review it means I’m still more than pleased! :)
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller
customer_reviews.text: I had this stroller system with my daughter ... And after 4.5 years of hard use and extensive travel, we have it away (bc she out grew it-- it still had life left!). When we found out we were having another baby, we knew without a doubt we wanted the same stroller system, and it has not disappointed! Great purchase for heavy City walking!
customer_reviews.author: PhDMommy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that when I put my baby inside the car seat he doesn’t seem comfortable is to narrow and Uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our first baby. The stroller took some time to get used to folding, and I always have to show people how to do it when they use it. The carseat has been great, our son is 1 now and still fits in it. It's not as roomy as other carseat's I've seen, so he's a little cramped in it now (He's 23 lbs but still fits according to the weight limit).
customer_reviews.author: Brynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Really tough to steer
customer_reviews.text: The car seat part of this is decent. Main main issue is that stroller is really hard to steer. It basically wants to go straight or make 90 degree turns. It’s not as terrible if you can use two hands to steer it. Then it will want to go straight or make 45 degree turns. But when you have kids and you are running around, rarely do you have a free hand. All in all, I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: avish

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel system I have ever used. The thing I love most about it is that I can fold the stroller with one hand and how easy it is to unfold it back. Also the customer service is amazing, I lost the car seat adapter during a trip and contacted the customer care, and they promptly responded and shipped me a new car seat adapter with no extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCanvas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this car seat and stroller. Great quality and so easy to put stroller together.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bird

customer_reviews.title: By far my best buy as a new mom
customer_reviews.text: The stroller lacks a tray, which is about the only down fall I can find. The car seat snaps right into the stroller for your infant to ride comfortably. The stroller is SO east to fold up and its extremely well made. I haven't found any terrain that it doesn't go through well.
customer_reviews.author: matt avant

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and will make you feel like your baby is safe.
customer_reviews.text: - Sturdy build. - The car seat is built solid. It also means you will need good arm strength to carry it around (with a baby in it). - The collapsing mechanism will take a little getting used to. It is not straight forward. - All the accessories are separate. Be sure to factor in the prices of those before you commit.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Review on set up and packaging- extremely easy! Putting the Britax stroller together was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Review on set up and packaging- extremely easy! Putting the Britax stroller together was a breeze! A few clicks and BAM stroller is done. Which means if I ever need to take it apart, I don’t need tools. Favorite mechanism is collapsing the stroller. One pull up and wham bam thank you Britax! Cannot wait to put my little lady in it :)
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Manuverable and Performs as Advertised by Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile stroller and seat. Biggest plus is that it is super manuverable. I highly recommend this stroller, and I researched strollers pretty well before buying it. I think it meets its advertising claims.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: New father here. Did a ton of research on what to buy and found out that this stroller car seat combo was the best option. Easy to install base in the car. The stroller is a little interesting to maneuver. Will take some time to get used to that. But to fold and unfold the stroller is a little difficult. Not as streamlined as I thought but still efficient. Overall great combo!
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product must buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality stroller. Amazing product and is easy to use. Lightweight and durable. This is worth every penny. Our friends have the city mini and they continue to have issues. We have never had any issues with this. This is a must buy product!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Morris

customer_reviews.title: I love the B Agile travel system
customer_reviews.text: I love the B Agile travel system! The car seat feel sturdy and I know my baby is safe when I put her in it. The Stroller is so easy to fold down and pop back up. The only thing is sometimes the stroller wheels will squeak and I cant seem to figure out why. It doesn't always do it just sometimes. But other than that I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product. Its really easy to fold, not that heavy to carry, the wheels are sturdy and large enough to make it easier to use around town on irregular terrain.
customer_reviews.author: bruce chow

customer_reviews.title: Love this set SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: Love this set SO MUCH. Works perfectly and I feel very safe toting my mini around in it... only complaint is even when I have the back of the stroller tightened all the way, it seems like my baby is reclined a little more than she wants to be now that she's 9 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this travel system easy to use by yourself
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel system easy to use by yourself. Easy to adjust. Comfortable for baby. Only downside no cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Needs more storage space besides that it's awesome. Easy to handle and fits nicely in small spaces
customer_reviews.author: kay gee

customer_reviews.title: B-Agile
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I’ve owned two. The first was given away after first child outgrew. Years later after new addition, bought again. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the car seat and stroller are excellent, quality, durability, easy to assemble EXCEPT for the fact that this car seat is way too HEAVY! This is a deal breaker for me, even my husband hates carrying it around. Right after delivery you aren't supposed to lift anything heavy but the car seat itself without a baby in it is excessively heavy. It makes getting anywhere a pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter says this is the Cadillac of these. She is the envy of her friends who settled for lesser cost ones
customer_reviews.author: Mac at Vint Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this set; I like the ability to put the front wheel on swivel or keep it locked forward. The car seat is well-made, easy to use. Good quality. Oh yeah, one complaint: I haven't figured out how to easily detach the car seat from the stroller. Once it's warmer and time to put this into action, I hope to figure that one out. I'm currently mystified, but sure I must be missing something...?
customer_reviews.author: Carly Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Best combination
customer_reviews.text: Best carseat and stroller combo. Easy to use in multiple cars since you only need a base.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great travel set
customer_reviews.text: High quality travel set that is easy to use/maneuver and most importantly keeps the little guy safe. The car seat is a little heavy, though I understand that is the trade off for the safer materials used. I would recommend this to other new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Daughter-in-law's baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law researched & asked around & said this was the best stroller/car seat the price.
customer_reviews.author: MadeInDetroit

customer_reviews.title: Best in the business.
customer_reviews.text: Super light, easy to assemble, very secure, easy to stroll around, looks great, enough space for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: ankt

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are terrible! They go every which way. Hard to push straight and the car seat is heavy. Release for car seat is hit or miss! Hard to open stroller; awkwardly need two hands. Just a mess!
customer_reviews.author: The Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: present
customer_reviews.text: I gave as present to my daughter and daughter in law and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: María

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good but there is no extra providnigs like cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but there is no extra providnigs like cup holder.foot rest etc.and the car seat is toooo heavyyy
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Product was easy to assemble as my fiance was able to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble as my fiance was able to do it without hardly any problem. The material seems like it will hold up well and will be easy to clean, but not as soft as some that I've felt. Stroller turned easily.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it! Great quality and keeps the little one safe
customer_reviews.author: METTA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and assemble. Daily use is easier than it seems it should be to click in and out of the base and stroller.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this car seat and stroller! It is so easy to get in and out of the car with the click in car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H

customer_reviews.title: Best travel system out there
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, it's not heavy or bulky like the others. It also runs smooth.
customer_reviews.author: PaganLebron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice combination
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to lock into the stroller. It moves very well. The con is for a stranger they might have difficulty folding up the stroller. It is also hard to release the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We love britax. Baby falls asleep when in the car almost instantly, so surely it’s a comfy seat. Easy to install correctly and the best seat you can get is one that you can install correctly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: I love the easy use of the stroller and car seat
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. I love the easy use of the stroller and car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Matin

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using for 6months & absolutely love it! The stroller is so nice to have!

customer_reviews.title: In love with this stroller car seat combo
customer_reviews.text: In love with this stroller car seat combo! Easy to assembly and it looks so sleek and modern. Smooth ride
customer_reviews.author: Demi C

customer_reviews.title: We love this travel system!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel system. This is the second one I’ve bought. I especially like the higher weight and height for the car seat. My daughter was able to stay in hers for a year. It is so easy to use and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Never order an open
customer_reviews.text: Totally unbelievable, but I bought the open box -like new and that means that only the box packaging is supposed to be damaged. However, to my surprise and disappointment there was no stroller inside! Only the car seat and wheels. So upset!!!
customer_reviews.author: EGiftCreator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Very solid build. Highest safety ratings. No brainer purchase. Stroller folds down very flat. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open box purchase for a decent brand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this travel system because of good reviews and recommendations. The open-box option offered a good deal. The only downfall is no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Named appropriately....very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, easy to use, and the stroller is “agile” and fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Henley

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love it... Baby is traveling in style and definitely feel that she fits comfortably and safe. Will def recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Change in price
customer_reviews.text: Most upset that it went on sale the month after we bought it for $100 more.

customer_reviews.title: I love this system
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this travel system. The stroller is very lightweight and super easy to fold and unfold. Handles with just a finger. The car seat seems to be very well made and easy to get in and out of the vehicle.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is very light. I had to buy separate compartments for storing keys, cell, water bottles etc and front stroller tray.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality, comfortable and easy to use. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for another family member and they love it so much I bought nother one for my granddaughter.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT deal! Just price match and you'll be blown away. And they're great products. We love these.

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat ever!

customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing anyone could buy. Such a smooth steering and so comfortable for the baby that they instantly sleep after hust a few minutes of riding.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller! Super easy to push and the one hand fold is priceless. Large storage area underneath.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! It's so light and effortless to push I have 4 kids and this is by far the best stroller I have used. Totally worth the investment. Yes the seat is More narrow then the older ones but its for a baby but thw time the baby gets to big i will have switched to another seat anyway. Plur i like that its lighter im carrying an extra 30lbs of plastic around.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat and stroller set! The stroller is so smooth riding and I love that the car seat can click right onto it. The car seat is so easy to use and my son fits very well into it.

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier with this stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooooo glad we chose this stroller!!! It’s soo practical (easy and light)! Exactly what we were looking for!!

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy the stroller is to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy the stroller is to set up and get in and out of the car. Car seat is a little heavy but not to bad. Easy to transfer the base to another car of needed.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love knowing that I purchase a product that would keep my baby safe

customer_reviews.text: The car seat is heavier than I expected it to be.

customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but the car seat wiggles so bad in the base it can’t be safe. I had to return it

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect love the fact that it's solid black makes it super easy to clean car seat

customer_reviews.title: This Stroller and car seat are fantastic! Very lightweight yet durable
customer_reviews.text: This Stroller and car seat are fantastic! Very lightweight yet durable. Easy to fold/unfold and hardly weighs so easy to pick up and maneuver.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Strolls perfectly and easy to assemble. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: It's a very sturdy stroller and we like the car seat
customer_reviews.text: It's a very sturdy stroller and we like the car seat.hopefully it will last, we have only used it six time's.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Long time britax fan. Third kid and I am exceptional pleased with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Active Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: This travel system is great! Carseat provides shock absorption and babies head stays in place. Carseat is a bit on the heavy side. Love the stroller. Easy to assemble. Took a few tries to close and open it, but got the hang of it. Going from babytrend to this travel system proves you get what you pay for! In this case it's worth every buck.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this stroller car seat set for my daughter who had her first child. Came exactly as expected. Easy to use and great sturdy car seat with base. Stroll is easy to set up and fold down. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LAVAF15

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: The car seat continually get stuck in the base... The base already broke and I am very disappointed the last britax we had was amazing so sad that this one is not!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Brazeal

customer_reviews.title: very light stroller, heavy car seat, excellent finish and easy to manuver
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the car seat for several weeks. It's heavier than I anticipated but the child will outgrow it quickly albeit the weight and metal clips make it blisteringly easy to snap in base, as well as on the stroller unlike other brands *cough* Graco. The stroller is very light, easy to maneuver and fold. I wish it would stand on it's own when folded. The fit and finish is excellent. There's plenty of storage underneath to stuff a medium parka and a baby bag. It comes with no accessories (e.g. cup holders for parents) which is disappointing. Alas for the Black Friday sale price, I'm not going to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sajjad

customer_reviews.title: the seat base has no way of being secured in ...
customer_reviews.text: the seat base has no way of being secured in the front. Only the back. Called Britax and they said this was normal. Normal that you baby can move upwards 3 inches?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not good not bad
customer_reviews.text: Price is dropping a lot. I bought it with $299 about 1 week ago. The quality of products are just so so. Not good not bad.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lighter weight, sturdy, easy to use. Every New mom needs one!

customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and does nort work. Impossible to adjust anything. Cheap!!!! DO NOT BUY. Please connect wih me before buying, i will explain you in more details.

customer_reviews.text: That’s the first time I install it and this front wheel doesn’t work. My god!!!

product_meta.title: Britax 2017 B-Agile 3 Stroller & B-Safe 35 Infant Car Seat - Raven
product_meta.description: Enjoy family time with this travel system that combines: The Britax B-Agile lightweight stroller and the Britax B-Safe 35 infant car seat in one convenient box. The B-Agile stroller is lightweight for easy transport and the swivel front 3-wheel design allows you to stroll effortlessly. The one hand fold stroller features an all-wheel suspension system that offers a smooth, comfortable ride. The B-Safe 35 infant car seat is engineered with Britax’s top safety technologies. The seat features a layer of side impact protection and the patented safe cell impact protection system includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, v shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Easy installation using safe center latch and built in lock offs makes it simple to secure the infant car seat base. The B-Safe 35 car seat is FAA approved without the base. Using the included adapter, you can securely attach the infant car seat to the stroller to make a brilliant travel system that is perfect for you are on the go lifestyle. The B-Safe 35 infant car seat can be used by children that are 4-35 pounds, height 32” or less. The B-Agile stroller can be used from birth to 55 pounds.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes: One B-Agile lightweight, aluminum frame stroller, one B-Safe 35 Infant car seat and car seat adapters

Stroller appropriate from birth, however, Britax recommends use only with an infant car seat until child has head and neck control. Do not use stroller with a child taller than 44 inches or weighs more than 55 lbs. Exceeding this limit may cause stroller to become unstable. Do not overload basket – Maximum weight in basket is 10 lbs
Use infant car seat only with children who weigh between 4 and 35 pounds and whose height is 32 inches or less.
Stroller dimensions (unfolded): 22.75" W x 40.5" H x 38.25" D. Stroller dimensions (folded): 22.75" W x 10" H x 29" D. Infant car seat dimensions: 17.75" W x 25" H x 26.5" D.
For your convenience, stroller is designed to be one-hand quick fold, allowing you to store it in no time and get on with your day.
